meanings.sent1: The man had an unhandsome face with crooked teeth.
meanings.sent2: She thought the painting was unhandsome and lacked color.
meanings.sent3: The unhandsome cat tried to impress the others with its clumsy dance.
meanings.sent4: The unhandsome building stood out among the elegant skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: The unhandsome rock formation was a stark contrast to the beautiful landscape.

meanings.sent1: Her unhandsome manners at the dinner table embarrassed her parents.
meanings.sent2: The unhandsome furniture in the room clashed with the modern decor.
meanings.sent3: The unhandsome puppy tried to act sophisticated but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: The unhandsome handwriting on the letter made it difficult to read.
meanings.sent5: The unhandsome dance moves lacked grace and finesse.
